result.ga: tá an teach ag titim as a chéile

result.html: tá an teach ag titim as a chéileThe house is falling apart.
result.ponchtml: tá an teaċ ag titim as a ċéileThe house is falling apart.

result.ga: tá a saol ag titim as a chéile
result.orig: tá a saol ag titim as a chéile
result.html: tá a saol ag titim as a chéileHer life is falling apart.
result.ponchtml: tá a saol ag titim as a ċéileHer life is falling apart.

result.eng: The country's civilization and civilization were falling apart.
result.ga: bhí sibhialtacht agus cultúr na tíre ag titim as a chéile
result.orig: bhí sibhialtacht agus cultúr na tíre ag titim as a chéile
result.html: bhí sibhialtacht agus cultúr na tíre ag titim as a chéileThe country's civilization and civilization were falling apart.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siḃialtaċt agus cultúr na tíre ag titim as a ċéileThe country's civilization and civilization were falling apart.

result.eng: Milosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ga: níorbh é milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don iúgslaiv
result.orig: níorbh é milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don iúgslaiv
result.html: níorbh é milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don iúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ponchtml: níorḃ é milosevic aṁáin faoi ndear gaċ coir in aġaiḋ na daonnaċta a ṫarla tráṫ titim as a ċéile don iúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.

result.eng: Apart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.
